name: Rhys
description: A fiery-tempered Marksman who can continue moving while attacking.

ultimate.name: Flame Barrage
ultimate.description:
Passive. Rhys can move while attacking but is unable to do so for 8s if under control effects. ATK SPD and Haste won't affect his attack animation speed. Every 1 ATK SPD or Haste grants him 2 Crit DMG Boost.

Rhys fires at enemies within a radius of arc, shooting 6 projectiles across the battlefield, each dealing 280% damage to enemies on its path. Rhys then loads his lance with Blast Ammo, allowing his normal attacks to deal 180% damage to the target and causing 40% splash damage to enemies in 1-tile arc behind the target until he is affected by a control effect.

upgrades.upgrade: Increases the damage dealt by each projectile against enemies on its path to 290%.
Increases the damage dealt by each projectile against enemies on its path to 300%.

Increases the damage dealt by each projectile against enemies on its path to 320%.

skill_1.name: Defensive Stance
skill_1.description:
Passive. Rhys gains 10 Crit.

Active. Rhys gains control immunity when taking control effects.

upgrades.upgrade: Restores 120% of his ATK as HP upon casting this skill.
Increases the Passive Crit bonus to 12.
Increases the Passive Crit bonus to 15.

skill_2.name: Concussive Strike
skill_2.description: Rhys loads Shock Ammo to shoot enemies within 2-tile, dealing 220% damage and knocking them back 2-tile. He's unable to cast this skill when loaded with Blast Ammo.

upgrades.upgrade: Increases damage to 230%

hero_focus.name: Hero Focus
hero_focus.description: Rhys increase his Crit DMG Boost by 22 during battle. He gains an extra 8 Crit DMG Boost when his lance is loaded with Blast Ammo.

ex_skill.name: Fury Rush
ex_skill.description: Rhys gains bonus movement speed when moving on the battlefield. He reaches the max speed 5s into a battle and loads Blast Ammo.

enhance_force.description: Reduces the cooldown of Defensive Stance to 3s.

season_skill.description: Gains 16 Crit and 13 Haste when there are no enemies within a 2-tile radius for the last 3s. This effect ends is after an enemy approaches.
